elementSpec.desc: contains a single TEI-conformant document, comprising a TEI header and a text, either in isolation or as part of a teiCorpus element.
符合TEI標準的單一文件，包括ㄧ個TEI標頭以及ㄧ個文本，可單獨出現或是處於元素tei文集之中。

attDef.desc: The version of the TEI scheme
attDef.valDesc: A number identifying the version of the TEI guidelines
用一個數字表示TEI指引的版本別

elementSpec.desc: contains a single text of any kind, whether unitary or composite, for example a poem or drama, a collection of essays, a novel, a dictionary, or a corpus sample.
包含ㄧ份任何種類的文本，無論是單一或是複合文件，像是詩詞或戲劇、散文集、小說、字典、或是文集。
contains the whole body of a single unitary text, excluding any front or back matter.
單篇文章的整體部分，不包含正文前及正文後資訊。

contains the body of a composite text, grouping together a sequence of distinct texts (or groups of such texts) which are regarded as a unit for some purpose, for example the collected works of an author, a sequence of prose essays, etc.
包含複合文本的正文，所匯集的一連串單一文件(或文件群組)，因為某特殊目的被視為ㄧ個整體，例如：ㄧ個作者作品的集合、一連串的散文集等。
contains a single text of any kind, whether unitary or composite, which interrupts the text containing it at any point and after which the surrounding text resumes.
TO BE TRANSLATED
contains a subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文、及正文後資訊的分支區段。
contains a first-level subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的第一層分項（若沒有使用區段層次0，區段層次1是最高層的分項。若使用區段層次0，則區段層次1是第二層分項）。
contains a second-level subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的第二層分項。
contains a third-level subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的第三層分項。
contains a fourth-level subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的第四層分項。
contains a fifth-level subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的第五層分項。
contains a sixth-level subdivision of the front, body, or back of a text.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的第六層分項。
contains the smallest possible subdivision of the front, body or back of a text, larger than a paragraph.
文件的正文前資訊、正文及正文後資訊的最低層分項，分段層級高於段落。
contains a closing title or footer appearing at the end of a division of a text.
包含文本中ㄧ區段結束時的結尾題名或尾錄。
contains the primary statement of responsibility given for a work on its title page or at the head or end of the work.
包含作品的主要責任陳述，出現在題名頁或作品開頭或結尾處。
contains a brief description of the place, date, time, etc. of production of a letter, newspaper story, or other work, prefixed or suffixed to it as a kind of heading or trailer.
TO BE TRANSLATED
A formal list or prose description of the topics addressed by a subdivision of a text.
規則列表或文字敘述，說明文件分段內容包含的主題。
contains a quotation, anonymous or attributed, appearing at the start of a section or chapter, or on a title page.
包含一段匿名或署名引文，出現在段落或章節的開頭，或在題名頁中。
groups together dateline, byline, salutation, and similar phrases appearing as a preliminary group at the start of a division, especially of a letter.
匯集日期地點、署名、稱呼語、及其他在區段開端出現的類似措辭，尤指信件開頭。
groups together salutations, datelines, and similar phrases appearing as a final group at the end of a division, especially of a letter.
匯集日期地點、署名、稱呼語、及其他在區段結尾出現的類似措辭，尤指信件結尾。
contains a salutation or greeting prefixed to a foreword, dedicatory epistle, or other division of a text, or the salutation in the closing of a letter, preface, etc.
包含在序言、獻詞、或其他文件區段開端的稱呼語或問候語，或是信件、引言等結尾處的致意詞。
contains the closing salutation, etc., appended to a foreword, dedicatory epistle, or other division of a text.
包含結尾致意詞等，附加在序言、獻詞、或其他文件區段中。
contains the title page of a text, appearing within the front or back matter.
包含文本的題名頁，出現在正文前資訊或正文後資訊之中

attDef.desc: classifies the title page according to any convenient typology.
attDef.valDesc: Any string, e.g. full, half, Series, etc.
任何的字串，例如: 完全, 不完全, 系列標題等。

elementSpec.desc: contains the title of a document, including all its constituents, as given on a title page.
文件題名，包含所有組成部分，同於題名頁上所顯示的題名。
contains a subsection or division of the title of a work, as indicated on a title page.
包含作品題名的部分或區段，同於題名頁上所標示的題名

attDef.desc: specifies the role of this subdivision of the title.
說明該題名部分的作用。

elementSpec.desc: contains the name of the author of the document, as given on the title page (often but not always contained in a byline).
包含文件作者名稱，同於題名頁上顯示的作者名 (經常但不一定出現在署名當中)。
contains a formal statement authorizing the publication of a work, sometimes required to appear on a title page or its verso.
包含作品出版的正式授權聲明，有時必須出現在題名頁、或反頁上。
contains an edition statement as presented on a title page of a document.
包含版本相關資訊，同於文件題名頁上所顯示的版本陳述
contains the imprint statement (place and date of publication, publisher name), as given (usually) at the foot of a title page.
包含文件出版說明 (出版日期、地點，以及出版公司)，同於(通常)在題名頁尾所顯示的出版資訊。
contains the date of a document, as given (usually) on a title page.
包含文件日期， 同於(通常)在題名頁上顯示的日期。

attDef.desc: gives the value of the date in a standard form, generally YYYY-MM-DD.
用標準形式來表示日期值，ㄧ般數值為 年-月-日。
attDef.valDesc: a date in one of the formats specified in XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition
列在XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition中的其中一種日期格式

elementSpec.desc: contains any prefatory matter (headers, title page, prefaces, dedications, etc.) found at the start of a document, before the main body.
包含位於文件最前端、正文之前的項目 (標頭、書名頁、前言、獻詞等)。
contains any appendixes, etc. following the main part of a text.
在正文之後，包含附錄等。
